rules_text:
Cast this spell only during your turn and only during the declare attackers step or with its acquiesce ability.
Untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
Acquiesce [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. When one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
